description: A great dipping sauce that has the flavour of red capsicum but with a smooth consistency.
keywords: Veggie dip,Seafood free,Wheat free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Red Capsicum Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium red capsicum, quartered and de-seeded

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Bake the peppers on a baking tray, skin side up, for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and allow to cool. Remove the skin from the peppers and add the flesh to a blender.
Add the rest of the ingredients and blend for 30 seconds before serving.
